mapper.select: select slid, slname, slinger, slalbum, slsong_address, slimg_address, song_sheetid from song_list where song_sheetid = #{id} order by slid
mapper.insert: insert into song_list(slname, slinger, slalbum, slsong_address, slimg_address, song_sheetid) values (#{slname},#{slinger},#{slalbum},#{slsongAddress},#{slimgAddress},#{songAheetid})
mapper.update: update song_list set slname = #{slname}, slinger = #{slinger}, slalbum= #{slalbum}, slsong_address = #{slsongAddress}, slimg_address = #{slimgAddress}, song_sheetid = #{songAheetid}, where slid = #{id}
